lead_paragraph: The retired general once led the United States Central Command, but his tour was cut short by the Obama administration, which believed he was too hawkish on Iran.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting from Cincinnati.
byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and ERIC SCHMITT

headline.print_headline: Trump Chooses Former Marine to Run Pentagon
headline.main: James Mattis, Outspoken Retired Marine, Is Trump’s Choice as Defense Secretary

snippet: The retired general once led the United States Central Command, but his tour was cut short by the Obama administration, which believed he was too hawkish on Iran....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump selects retired Marine Gen James N Mattis, who led oversees military operations in Middle East and Southwest Asia from 2010 to 2013, to serve as secretary of defense; appointment awaits Senate approval.
